data.title: The Gods of Mars & The Warlord of Mars
data.meta_description: Garden City, New York: Nelson Doubleday, Inc., 1971. Frazetta, Frank. Book Club BCE/BOMC . Hard Cover. Very Good / Good. Item #2341699 Book club edition. Jacket rubbed, sticker remnant on front endpaper. 336 pp. 8vo. Two John Carter novels in one volume, with jacket art and illustrations by Frank Frazetta. Edgar Rice Burroughs
data.text:
Garden City, New York: Nelson Doubleday, Inc., 1971. Frazetta, Frank. Book Club (BCE/BOMC). Hard Cover. Very Good / Good. Item #2341699

Book club edition. Jacket rubbed, sticker remnant on front endpaper.

336 pp. 8vo. Two John Carter novels in one volume, with jacket art and illustrations by Frank Frazetta. "Edgar Rice Burroughs (September 1, 1875 â€“ March 19, 1950) was an American author, best known for his creation of the jungle hero Tarzan and the heroic Mars adventurer John Carter, although he produced works in many genres."
